p: Viral RNA was extracted from the serum and urine samples by using the QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit (QIAGEN, Hilden, Germany). The Superscript III Platinum OneStep Real Time RT-PCR system (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA) was used for RNA amplification to analyze gene expression. PCRs specific for DENV, CHIKV, and ZIKV were performed using the CDC Trioplex Real-time RT-PCR Assay (Trioplex Real-time RT-PCR Assay, method available at http://www.fda.gov/downloads/MedicalDevices/Safety/EmergencySituations/UCM491592.pdf).
